duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell the entire Molex portfolio of products to the targeted account base.
Show a record of continuous profitable revenue growth measurable by performance to set budgets every six months.
Demonstrate a strong, steady pipeline of demand creation activities to fuel continuous territory growth measurable by CRM performance to budgets set once per year.
Prioritize workload to maximize the performance of revenue growth and demand creation activities.
Identify and track business designed into the territory that is ultimately brought elsewhere to assure revenue capture by Molex.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Technical Area
